tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (FRAG (NP (NP (PRP$ My) (NNS friends)) (ADJP (RB very) (JJ nervous))) (PP (IN with) (NP (PRP$ their) (NN speech)))))
tweetSentenceList.depTree: [friends/NNS nmod:poss>My/PRP$ amod>[nervous/JJ advmod>very/RB] nmod:with>[speech/NN case>with/IN nmod:poss>their/PRP$]]
